scenes.title: Opening: The Cosmic Awakening
scenes.description: Stars shimmer against the void. A colossal spacecraft, “The Primordial,” drifts silently, its hull adorned with ancient reptilian motifs. Inside, the silhouettes of dinosaurs move purposefully.

shots.composition: The vast expanse of space with stars and the spacecraft
shots.effects: Starlight shimmering, silhouette of dinosaurs moving
shots.lighting: Low-key, with highlights on the spacecraft

safety: Ensure secure setup of dolly and camera

scenes.script: Stars shimmer against the void. A colossal spacecraft, “The Primordial,” drifts silently, its hull adorned with ancient reptilian motifs. Inside, the silhouettes of dinosaurs move purposefully.

scenes.title: The Council of Titans
scenes.description: A vast, futuristic control room with holographic maps of the solar system. Dinosaur leaders in spacesuits gather around a circular table.

shots.composition: The control room, holographic maps, dinosaur leaders around the table
shots.lighting: High-key, with highlights on the dinosaurs and holographic maps

scenes.script: Our course is set. Mars calls to us—not as a barren rock, but as a realm ripe for rebirth under our rule...

scenes.title: Mission Briefing
scenes.description: Holograms project detailed images of Mars’ surface—vast canyons, ancient riverbeds, and potential energy sources.

shots.action: Commander Stegos is briefing, others are listening
shots.lighting: High-key, with highlights on the holograms and dinosaurs

scenes.script: Our objective is clear: secure a foothold on Mars, harness its resources, and build a new dominion...
